channel.title: Runescape Packet Sniffing- is it the way to hack?
channel.description: Hi, Id just like to ask if its possible to receive passwords for runescape accounts by sniffing jagexs server with wireshark or something similar(backtrack or ethereal)...Since its possible to get lots of info in local networks etc, and someone told me it was possible, id like to again ask the pros on this forum. Please reply this is serious. Thanks Nicki

item.title: Runescape Packet Sniffing- is it the way to hack?
item.dc:creator: @burq burq
item.description:
@burq wrote:

This forum is for moparscape questions not for runescape questions.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Packet Sniffing- is it the way to hack?
